title: RP adding failure
body:
Hey, recently i have 2 $25 league RP cards. i go to activate it, it redeems but i don't get the RP.


Please Help

replies.body: Just wait patiently. if the server maintenance is over but your rp is still not credited then send riot a support ticket concerning this problem. Just send one support ticket and not multiple as they are probably busy trying to assist others with the same problem as you.

As you have probably seen from the numerous other posts with the same issue:

>Wait a while to see if it credits automatically, as it can sometimes take a while. 
If it isn't please send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the relevant information (time renewed and a photo of the back of the card) and they will sort you out. **Please send it under the "billing" category.**
Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). **During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket**, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.
